instructions: Mix flours, salt, yeast, (malt opt). Add water, knead 5-7 min. Cover, rest 30 min.
Fold dough 8x, cover, rest 30 min. Repeat 3x (4 sets total). Cover, chill 24-72h.
On floured counter, gently pat dough to 8" square. Divide in half, then each half in 2. Rest 45 min.
Roll each piece into a loose log, rest 30 min.
Shape: Flatten, fold top to center, rotate, fold again. Fold in half, seal. Roll to 15" with pointed ends.
Place seam-up on floured couche, cover, proof 45-60 min.
Preheat oven to 260°C/500°F with baking stone.
Transfer loaves seam-down to parchment. Slash 3 times at 30° angle.
Bake on stone, cover with inverted pans 5 min. Remove pans, bake 12-15 min until browned. Cool 20 min.
